verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H4550>journeys<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with their <S%H6635>armies<s%> under the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H853><s%> their goings <S%H4161>out<s%> according to their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> are their <S%H4550>journeys<s%> according to their goings <S%H4161>out.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Rameses<s%> <S%H7486><s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month;<s%> on the <S%H4480>morrow<s%> <S%H4283><s%> after the <S%H6453>passover<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> with a <S%H7311>high<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

For the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H5221>smitten<s%> among them: upon their <S%H430>gods<s%> also the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Rameses,<s%> <S%H7486><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H5523>Succoth.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Succoth,<s%> <S%H5523><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H864>Etham,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Etham,<s%> <S%H864><s%> and turned <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> <S%H6367>Pi-hahiroth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H1189>Baal-zephon:<s%> and they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4024>Migdol.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H6367>Pi-hahiroth,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H1870>journey<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H864>Etham,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H4785>Marah.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Marah,<s%> <S%H4785><s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H362>Elim:<s%> and in <S%H362>Elim<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5869>fountains<s%> of <S%H4325>water,<s%> and threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> palm <S%H8558>trees;<s%> and they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Elim,<s%> <S%H362><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H4480>sea,<s%> <S%H3220><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5512>Sin.<s%>
And they took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> out of the <S%H4480>wilderness<s%> <S%H4057><s%> of <S%H5512>Sin,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1850>Dophkah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Dophkah,<s%> <S%H1850><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H442>Alush.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Alush,<s%> <S%H442><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H7508>Rephidim,<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Rephidim,<s%> <S%H7508><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from the <S%H4480>desert<s%> <S%H4057><s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> at <S%H6914>Kibroth-hattaavah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Kibroth-hattaavah,<s%> <S%H6914><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H2698>Hazeroth.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Hazeroth,<s%> <S%H2698><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H7575>Rithmah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Rithmah,<s%> <S%H7575><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> at <S%H7428>Rimmon-parez.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Rimmon-parez,<s%> <S%H7428><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H3841>Libnah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Libnah,<s%> <S%H3841><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> at <S%H7446>Rissah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H4480>Rissah,<s%> <S%H7446><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H6954>Kehelathah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>went<s%> from <S%H4480>Kehelathah,<s%> <S%H6954><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8234>Shapher.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H8234>Shapher,<s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H2732>Haradah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Haradah,<s%> <S%H2732><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H4722>Makheloth.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Makheloth,<s%> <S%H4722><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H8480>Tahath.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Tahath,<s%> <S%H8480><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> at <S%H8646>Tarah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Tarah,<s%> <S%H8646><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H4989>Mithcah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>went<s%> from <S%H4480>Mithcah,<s%> <S%H4989><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H2832>Hashmonah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Hashmonah,<s%> <S%H2832><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H4149>Moseroth.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Moseroth,<s%> <S%H4149><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H1142>Bene-jaakan.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Bene-jaakan,<s%> <S%H1142><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H2735>Horhagidgad.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>went<s%> from <S%H4480>Horhagidgad,<s%> <S%H2735><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H3193>Jotbathah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Jotbathah,<s%> <S%H3193><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H5684>Ebronah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Ebronah,<s%> <S%H5684><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> at <S%H6100>Ezion-gaber.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Ezion-gaber,<s%> <S%H6100><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is <S%H6946>Kadesh.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Kadesh,<s%> <S%H6946><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor,<s%> in the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> in the <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4194>died<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor.<s%>

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6166>Arad<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5045>south<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H935>coming<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H4480>Hor,<s%> <S%H2023><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H6758>Zalmonah.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Zalmonah,<s%> <S%H6758><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H6325>Punon.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Punon,<s%> <S%H6325><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H88>Oboth.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Oboth,<s%> <S%H88><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H5863>Ije-abarim,<s%> in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Iim,<s%> <S%H5864><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in <S%H1769>Dibon-gad.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Dibon-gad,<s%> <S%H1769><s%> and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H5963>Almon-diblathaim.<s%>
And they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H4480>Almon-diblathaim,<s%> <S%H5963><s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H5682>Abarim,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo.<s%>

And they <S%H5265>departed<s%> from the <S%H4480>mountains<s%> <S%H2022><s%> of <S%H5682>Abarim,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> from <S%H4480>Beth-jesimoth<s%> <S%H1020><s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H63>Abel-shittim<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3588>When<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> are passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%>

Then ye shall drive <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4906>pictures,<s%> and <S%H6>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H6754>images<s%> and quite pluck <S%H8045>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their high places: <S%H1116><s%>

And ye shall <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> the <S%H853>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein: <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>you<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

And ye shall <S%H5157>divide<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> for an inheritance among your <S%H4940>families:<s%> and to the <S%H7227>more<s%> ye shall give the <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and to the <S%H4592>fewer<s%> ye shall give the <S%H4591>less<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> every man's inheritance shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the place <S%H413>where<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> his <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>falleth;<s%> according to the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> ye shall <S%H5157>inherit.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> ye will <S%H3808>not<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you; then it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that those <S%H834>which<s%> ye let <S%H3498>remain<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them shall be <S%H7899>pricks<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H6796>thorns<s%> in your <S%H6654>sides,<s%> and shall <S%H6887>vex<s%> you <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H3427>dwell.<s%>
Moreover it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that I shall <S%H6213>do<s%> unto you, <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H1819>thought<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> unto them.
